name: iddd
title: My Goals
desc: Why should I build a plan with Digital Health Coach? Like any good coach, Digital Health Coach wants to help you be your best and do your best! Digital Health Coach will build a plan thatâ€™s focused on your personal health needs and prioritize the Goals you should be working on.
text:
Ready to build a plan with Digital Health Coach?

With your customized Digital Health Coach plan, you will:

LEARN practical, useful information about improving your health

TAKE ACTION and practice skills that will become lifelong healthy habits

TRACK important health measurements as well as your overall progress on your Goals

And like any good coach, Digital Health Coach will support you every step of the way with tips, reminders, and other ways to help you stay motivated!
